meanings.definition: Incorrectly dividing or separating something into parts
meanings.sent1: She always misdivisions her toys when cleaning up.
meanings.sent2: The teacher warned the students not to misdivisions the puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent3: The robot misdivisions the colors and ended up with a rainbow mess.
meanings.sent4: His attempt to misdivisions the responsibilities among the team members only caused confusion.
meanings.sent5: The chef's attempt to misdivisions the ingredients led to a disastrous cake.

meanings.definition: Mistakes in the process of dividing or separating something
meanings.sent1: The misdivisions in the project plan caused delays.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the misdivisions in the accounting report.
meanings.sent3: The misdivisions in the recipe made the dish taste strange.
meanings.sent4: The misdivisions in the map led the hikers astray.
meanings.sent5: The misdivisions in the schedule resulted in missed appointments.
